definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Another fantastic picture is the piece of small household dust below.
sentences.chinese: 另一幅不可思议的图片是下面这张家庭微尘的照片。

sentences.english: All we are dust in the wind, everything is dust in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 我们确实只是风中的一粒微尘。

sentences.english: And our lives are just the fleeting infinitesimal motes.
sentences.chinese: 而我们的生命，不过是转瞬即逝的一星微尘。

sentences.english: All is dust in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 这一切只不过是风中的微尘。

sentences.english: Life like rain, go as dust.
sentences.chinese: 人生来如风雨，去如微尘。

sentences.english: We should stop talking about the menace of fallout.
sentences.chinese: 我们不应再谈论关于放射性微尘的危害。

sentences.english: On motes light belief meet in the Peach Garden.
sentences.chinese: 依着微尘的灯光信念相逢在桃花源。

sentences.english: Gandhi said that whatever you do in life will be insignificant.
sentences.chinese: 甘地说，你一生中做的每件事都是渺若微尘的。

sentences.english: Man comes as wind and rain but goes like mote.
sentences.chinese: 人生来如风雨，去如微尘。

sentences.english: I stare at the train window marked with soft dust.
sentences.chinese: 我注视着那沾有微尘的车窗。

sentences.english: We have not crushed the joy to the utmost to wring from it the wine of pain.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有把喜乐压成微尘来榨取痛苦之酒。

definition: great wide world/marvelously diverse world/(Buddhism) cosmos (abbr. for 三千大千世界[san1 qian1 da4 qian1 shi4 jie4])
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
mundane world (in religious context)/this mortal coil
to float/to drift/to wander/variant of 蜉蝣[fu2 you2]
abbr. for 天津外國語大學|天津外国语大学[Tian1 jin1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2]
Buddha's teachings/aura (around the head of Buddha)
